issue.title: Auto Alias when creating a new physical service
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Creating a new physical service, the Alias should be generated when it is left to blank like all others joomla objects

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hello Thomas,

We will update such ticket when 4.0.0 stable version is out if it's OK for you...

Thanks
